title: Our Partners
subtitle: Trusted by leading companies
description: We work with industry leaders to deliver exceptional results. Our partnerships are built on trust, innovation, and mutual success.

partner-1.title: FREEDOM HOLDING CORP.
partner-1.shortDescription: 762 m² space and ~$150K equipment; joint DS/DE/BA courses; goal — grow talent and analytical thinking
partner-1.description: 762 m² of space and ~$150K worth of equipment; joint DS/DE/BA courses for employees and students; the goal is to train specialists and develop analytical thinking.

partner-2.title: SDU UNIVERSITY
partner-2.shortDescription: AI adoption and process automation; analytics systems, chatbots, knowledge bases
partner-2.description: We implement AI and automate internal processes; develop and support analytics systems, chatbots, and knowledge bases; the university provides resources and support.

partner-3.title: qCloudy
partner-3.shortDescription: Official AWS partner in KZ: joint AI/ML cloud projects, workshops and courses
partner-3.description: Official AWS partner in Kazakhstan: joint AI/ML projects in the cloud, workshops and courses; access to AWS Academy, certifications, vouchers and corporate accounts.
